plot: Two people. Two countries. Two lifestyles. One soul. This is a story of a soul that never sleeps. When Ariana closes her eyes at night in Los Angeles, the soul wakes up in Katya's body in Russia.
title: 1 Soul 2 TimeZones
plot_es: Two people. Two countries. Two lifestyles. One soul. This is a story of a soul that never sleeps. When Ariana closes her eyes at night in Los Angeles, the soul wakes up in Katya's body in Russia.
